alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 31 at 9:46AM CDT until September 02 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George, Greene and Jackson Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, water covers the main road at Plum Bluff in southern George County. At 22.0 feet, flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. At 23.5 feet, water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 23.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday evening and will continue falling to a stage of 13.3 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
